column5: Member: Do you hold a signed mandate from the member to deduct tax from their unauthorised payment? (YES/NO)
column6: Member: Is the value of the unauthorised payment more than 25% of the pension fund for the individual? (YES/NO)
column7: Member: Is the scheme paying the unauthorised payment surcharge on behalf of the member? (YES/NO)
column11: Member and employer: Nature of the unauthorised payment or deemed unauthorised payment (see instructions for details)
column12: Member and employer: Description of nature of payment  (see instructions for details)
column13: Member and Employer: Total value or amount of the unauthorised payment (£)
column14: Member and employer: Date of payment or when benefit made available (see instructions for details)
